ComicInfo.Title: A View from Without; Dragon Slayer; Yesterday's Rain; The Comic Book Freak; Sally's Song; Hero; Veteran; Home; Comes the Grey Dawn; Soul Food; The Coming of the Piranas; Impact; Sword of Dragonus
ComicInfo.Summary:
A spaceship is shrink down to the size of a mosquito and is ultimately squashed by a colleague.
A barbarian named Dragonus battles wizards, demons and beasts to save a princess from being sacrificed.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:48:54. [Issue ID 641392]
